inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let typeMapTable = datatable(type_id_d:double, type_name:string)
  [
    1,  "Application Log",
    2,  "Application Lifecycle",
    3,  "Update",
    6,  "Update Available",
    7,  "User Message",
    9,  "Registration",
    11, "Commmand Activity",
    15, "BitLocker",
    20, "User Session Audit",
    21, "Entity Audit",
    22, "Policy Override Audit",
    40, "Certificate Lifecycle",
    41, "Certificate Expiry",
    30, "License Lifecycle",
    31, "License Expiry",
    32, "License Count",
    1000, "Status",
    1005, "CPU Usage",
    1006, "Memory Usage",
    1007, "Throughput",
    8000, "User Session Activity",
    8001, "Process Activity",
    8002, "Module Activity",
    8003, "File Activity",
    8004, "Directory Activity",
    8005, "Registry Key Activity",
    8006, "Registry Value Activity",
    8007, "Host Network Activity",
    8008, "Memory Activity",
    8009, "Kernel Activity",
    8010, "Network Activity",
    8011, "Email Activity",
    8012, "Email File Activity",
    8013, "Email URL Activity",
    8014, "Host Network Traffice Activity",
    8020, "Scan",
    8021, "Unscannable File",
    8025, "Boot Record Detection",
    8026, "User Session Detection",
    8027, "Process Detection",
    8028, "Module Detection",
    8029, "Memory Detection",
    8030, "Kernel Detection",
    8031, "File Detection",
    8032, "Registry Key Detection",
    8033, "Registry Value Detection",
    8034, "Email File Detection",
    8035, "Email Detection",
    8036, "Email URL Detection",
    8037, "Host Network Traffic Detection",
    8038, "Peripheral Device Detection",
    8040, "Host Network Detection",
    8045, "Process Response",
    8046, "File Response",
    8047, "Registry Key Response",
    8048, "Registry Value Response",
    8050, "Network Detection",
    8060, "Monitored Source",
    8070, "Compliance Scan",
    8071, "Compliance",
    8080, "User Session Query Result",
    8081, "Process Query Result",
    8082, "Module Query Result",
    8083, "File Query Result",
    8084, "Directory Query Result",
    8085, "Registry Key Query Result",
    8086, "Registry Value Query Result",
    8087, "Network Query Result",
    8089, "Kernel Object Query Result",
    8090, "Service Query Result",
    8100, "User Session Remediation",
    8101, "Process Remediation",
    8102, "Module Remediation",
    8103, "File Remediation",
    8104, "Directory Remediation",
    8105, "Registry Key Remediation",
    8106, "Registry Value Remediation",
    8107, "Network Remediation",
    8109, "Kernel Remediation",
    8110, "Service Remediation",
    8119, "Unsuccessful Remediation Result",
    9000, "Content Detection",
    9001, "File Content Detection",
    9002, "Email Content Detection",
    9003, "Instant Message Content Detection"
  ];
SymantecICDX_CL
 | where (category_id_d == 1 and (type_id_d==8031 or type_id_d==8046 or type_id_d==8028 or type_id_d==8021)) or
 (category_id_d == 5 and (type_id_d==8004 or type_id_d==8003 or type_id_d==8002)) or
 (category_id_d == 7 and (type_id_d==8084 or type_id_d==8083 or type_id_d==8082 or type_id_d==8104 or type_id_d==8103 or type_id_d==8102))
| join kind = inner (typeMapTable) on type_id_d 
| summarize Event_Count=count() by Event_Type=type_name

    8084, "Directory Query Result",
    8085, "Registry Key Query Result",

    8087, "Network Query Result",
    8089, "Kernel Object Query Result",

SymantecICDX_CL
| where file_name_s <> ""
| where (category_id_d == 1 and (type_id_d==8031 or type_id_d==8046 or type_id_d==8028 or type_id_d==8021)) or
 (category_id_d == 5 and (type_id_d==8004 or type_id_d==8003 or type_id_d==8002)) or
 (category_id_d == 7 and (type_id_d==8084 or type_id_d==8083 or type_id_d==8082 or type_id_d==8104 or type_id_d==8103 or type_id_d==8102))
| join kind = inner (typeMapTable) on type_id_d 
| summarize Event_Count=count() by Event_Type=type_name
| sort by Event_Count desc

content.PartTitle: Number of file events with file objects

"2,30", "Remove",

"2,31", "Expired",

"2,32", "Exceeded",

"2,9001", "Allowed",
"12,9001", "Quarantined",

"12,9002", "Quarantined",
"20,9002", "Approved",

"2,9003", "Allowed"
];
SymantecICDX_CL
| where file_name_s <> ""
| where (category_id_d == 1 and (type_id_d==8031 or type_id_d==8046 or type_id_d==8028 or type_id_d==8021)) or
 (category_id_d == 5 and (type_id_d==8004 or type_id_d==8003 or type_id_d==8002)) or
 (category_id_d == 7 and (type_id_d==8084 or type_id_d==8083 or type_id_d==8082 or type_id_d==8104 or type_id_d==8103 or type_id_d==8102))
| extend disposition_type = strcat(toint(id_d), ",", toint(type_id_d))  
| join kind = inner (disptypeMap) on disposition_type
| summarize Action_Count=count() by Action

content.PartTitle: Disposition distribution across events with file object

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SymantecICDX_CL 
| where file_name_s <> ""
| where (category_id_d == 1 and (type_id_d==8031 or type_id_d==8046 or type_id_d==8028 or type_id_d==8021)) or
 (category_id_d == 5 and (type_id_d==8004 or type_id_d==8003 or type_id_d==8002)) or
 (category_id_d == 7 and (type_id_d==8084 or type_id_d==8083 or type_id_d==8082 or type_id_d==8104 or type_id_d==8103 or type_id_d==8102))
 | summarize Count=count() by product_name_s
 | sort by Count desc

content.PartTitle: Product distribution across events with file objects

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let severityMapTable = datatable(severity_id_d:double, severity_name:string)
  [
    0, "Unknown",
    1, "Informational",
    2, "Warning",
    3, "Minor",
    4, "Major",
    5, "Critical",
    6, "Fatal"
];
SymantecICDX_CL 
| where file_name_s <> ""
| where (category_id_d == 1 and (type_id_d==8031 or type_id_d==8046 or type_id_d==8028 or type_id_d==8021)) or
 (category_id_d == 5 and (type_id_d==8004 or type_id_d==8003 or type_id_d==8002)) or
 (category_id_d == 7 and (type_id_d==8084 or type_id_d==8083 or type_id_d==8082 or type_id_d==8104 or type_id_d==8103 or type_id_d==8102))
| join kind = inner (severityMapTable) on severity_id_d 
| summarize Count=count() by Severity_Type=severity_name
| sort by Count desc

content.PartTitle: Severity distribution across events with file object

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SymantecICDX_CL 
| where (category_id_d == 1 and (type_id_d==8031 or type_id_d==8046 or type_id_d==8028 or type_id_d==8021)) or
 (category_id_d == 5 and (type_id_d==8004 or type_id_d==8003 or type_id_d==8002)) or
 (category_id_d == 7 and (type_id_d==8084 or type_id_d==8083 or type_id_d==8082 or type_id_d==8104 or type_id_d==8103 or type_id_d==8102))
 | extend username = iff(user_name_s <> "", user_name_s , "Unknown")
 | summarize Count=count() by User_Name=username 
 | sort by Count desc
 | top 25 by Count desc

content.PartTitle: Top 25 users Across events with file object

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let threatTypeMap = datatable(threat_type_id_d:double, threat_category:string)
  [
    1, "Malware",
    2, "Behavioural",
    3, "Potentially Unwanted Applications",
    4, "Exploit (pep)",
    5, "Heuristic",
    6, "Security Risk"
  ];
SymantecICDX_CL
| where file_name_s <> ""
| join kind = inner (threatTypeMap) on threat_type_id_d 
| extend threat_category_fnl = iff(threat_category <> "", threat_category, "Unknown")
| summarize Count=count() by Threat_Category=threat_category_fnl
| sort by Count desc
| top 25 by Count desc

content.PartTitle: Threat categories across events with file object

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SymantecICDX_CL
| where file_name_s <> ""
| where (category_id_d == 1 and (type_id_d==8031 or type_id_d==8046 or type_id_d==8028 or type_id_d==8021)) or
 (category_id_d == 5 and (type_id_d==8004 or type_id_d==8003 or type_id_d==8002)) or
 (category_id_d == 7 and (type_id_d==8084 or type_id_d==8083 or type_id_d==8082 or type_id_d==8104 or type_id_d==8103 or type_id_d==8102))
| extend threatname = iff(threat_name_s <> "", threat_name_s , "Unknown")
| summarize Event_Count=count() by File_Name=file_name_s, Threat_Name=threatname, Product_Name=product_name_s
| sort by Event_Count desc
| top 25 by Event_Count desc
